summary: Slight color retexture of the Daedric Weapons
descriptionHtml:
I was somewhat dissatisfied with the Daedric Weapons \'look\', so I decided to recolor them a litle to suit my taste.  

Darkened the \'vein\' backgrounds so that the \'veins\' stand out nicely when turning the weapons

Added some minor gold work here and there.  Nothing major or overboard.

Darkened and recolored the grips (these just seemed too light to me)

This is my first attempt at releasing a \'public\' mod, so I hope everyone can forgive any issue that crop up.
author: Blitzkrieg64
